name: Datamark
tagline: Committed to Serve, Solve and Improve.
description: DATAMARK, Inc. is a leading BPO company headquartered in El Paso, Texas. They serve Fortune 500 companies, government agencies and other large enterprises at their delivery centers worldwide, including the U.S., Mexico and India. DATAMARK provides a wide range of outsourced back-office services, including bilingual (English/Spanish) customer contact centers; high-volume digital mailroom management; document processing and document management; and process improvement consulting.
